refactoringOperationDescriptor.name: Add BITS DOCTYPE - NLM/NCBI Book Interchange 2.0
refactoringOperationDescriptor.description: A DOCTYPE declaration is added with the FPI indicating the NLM 'BITS' (Book Interchange) 2.0 tag set. If you end up with a parser error from having two such declarations, remove or comment out your old one (Ctrl-Shift-Comma).
